title: Open Tues 7:15-7:30pm,on the west side of Nob Hil((1335 Pacific#315)
posting_body: Third floor, contemporary 1BR+Office/1BA on the west side of Nob Hill near Pacific and Leavenworth.
Floors are hardwood except in bath.
Deep living room has kitchen with bar-style counter at one end, windows at the other.
Kitchen includes electric stove and dishwasher.
The apartment has tremendous closet space: all are wall closets with sliding doors.
There is one in the bedroom, one in the office, one next to the entrance and the last near the bath.
A room perfect for an office is to the left of the kitchen.
It is open to the living room.
Standard bath has shower over tub with sliding glass doors.
Parking is available in the building for an additional fee.
Building is 2.5 blocks from the middle of Polk Street's shopping and dining district.
It has an elevator and shared laundry room.
Walk Score is 96, Transit Score is 99.
Bus lines 1, 10, 12, 41 and 45 within easy walking distance as well as all three cable car lines.
Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.
Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
